channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: Gaza faces a "dire" food situation as barely more than 300 aid trucks have entered the strip since Israel began its offensive in Rafah, a UN agency said in a report published Friday. Follow live updates.

item.title: Seize the Grey wins the Preakness for D. Wayne Lukas and ends Mystik Dan’s Triple Crown bid
item.description: Seize the Grey win the Preakness Stakes for Hall of Fame trainer D. Wayne Lukas.

item.title: May 17, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Israeli military said Friday it recovered the bodies of three hostages — Shani Louk, Amit Bouskila, and Itshak Gelernter — in the Gaza Strip.

item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Israeli cabinet minister threatens to resign
item.description: More than six months after Hamas terrorists invaded Israel on Oct. 7, the Israeli military continues its bombardment of the neighboring Gaza Strip.

item.title: World No. 1 golfer Scottie Scheffler arrested outside PGA Championship
item.description: World No. 1 golfer Scottie Scheffler was arrested and charged with a felony and other counts Friday morning outside the PGA Championship in Louisville, Kentucky. Follow here live updates.

item.title: Dive team finds bodies of 2 men dead inside plane found upside down in Alaska lake
item.description: Alaska State Troopers say dive teams found the two bodies.

item.title: May 16, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israel called South Africa the "legal arm" of Hamas on Thursday after it accused Israeli forces, in remarks at the International Court of Justice, of failing to protect civilians in the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: Man suspected of shooting infant son in hostage standoff apparently killed himself
item.description: He was found in the rubble of a Phoenix home that caught fire during a standoff.

item.title: Trump defense grills Michael Cohen in hush money trial
item.description: The cross-examination of Michael Cohen, the prosecution's key witness in the Donald Trump criminal hush money trial, will resume Monday. Closing arguments could begin as early as Tuesday.

item.title: 6 people killed, 10 others injured in Idaho when pickup crashes into passenger van
item.description: The two-car accident included a large passenger van, authorities said.
